meanings.sent1: She showed an undauntable spirit when facing challenges.
meanings.sent2: His undauntable attitude inspired others to keep going.
meanings.sent3: Even after failing multiple times, her undauntable determination never wavered.
meanings.sent4: His undauntable courage in the face of danger was truly admirable.
meanings.sent5: The undauntable hero faced the dragon without fear.

meanings.definition: Unable to be daunted or discouraged
meanings.sent1: The undauntable explorer ventured into the unknown with confidence.
meanings.sent2: Their undauntable resolve led them to overcome all obstacles.
meanings.sent3: The undauntable cat kept trying to catch the elusive laser pointer.
meanings.sent4: The undauntable sun rose each day, bringing light to the world.
meanings.sent5: His undauntable optimism shone through even in the darkest times.
